extensionDescription.message: Lightweight bookmarking for the avid reader.
extensionDescription.description: Pressing the Pile button puts a bookmark in a dedicated bookmark folder. A sidebar gives you quick access to its content. You can show/hide the sidebar via the sidebar button on the toolbar or by pressing a shortcut (Alt+Shift+S).

buttonTitle.description: Put a bookmark in the Pile's bookmark folder.

ExecuteSidebarAction.description: Show or hide the Pile sidebar.

putOnPileMessage.message: Put the page on the Pile and close it.
putOnPileMessage.description: Close the tab and put a bookmark in the Pile bookmark folder.

putAllOnPileMessage.message: Put ALL unpinned tabs on the Pile and close them.
putAllOnPileMessage.description: Close ALL unpinned tabs and put a bookmark for each of them in the Pile's bookmark folder.

addPageToPileTitle.message: Add the current page to the Pile
addPageToPileTitle.description: title text of the add button

deleteSelectedTitle.description: Delete selected bookmarks confirmation button title
